channel.title: Silent Universe
channel.description: Prime-Time Drama for your ears! The future changes ... but mankind stays the same. There were those who thought that the dawn of the Second Space Age would unite humanity in a common cause. Dreams of grand utopia's fevered the minds of visionaries and futurists, who proclaimed that the stars would save us from ourselves ... they couldn't have been more wrong.

item.title: Silent Universe 1x06 - The Wheel Never Stops
item.description: (Free Stereo Upgrade) Suspicion and intrigue take center stage as a member of Serendipity starts to show his true colors...

item.title: Silent Universe - Episode 6 Preview!
item.description: Episode 6 in the works! Free preview of the high-def version of S/U

item.title: Silent Universe 1x05 - Eternity - Pt 2
item.description: Kostya Abramov's plans unfold, sweeping the unwitting members of Serendipity into a conspiracy larger than any of them can yet imagine.

item.title: Silent Universe - Episode 5 Preview!
item.description: Episode 5 out this week! Free preview of the high-def version of S/U

item.title: Silent Universe Update
item.description: A quick update on Ep5 news and RL events

item.title: Silent Universe Promo
item.description: The current promo for the Silent Universe podcast. Use it, please!

item.title: Silent Universe Companion - 002
item.description: Comments on Episode 4, 206-33-XAVIER (2063392843), Podcast Alley, and more Silent Universe promos than I know what to do with!

item.title: Silent Universe 1x04 - Eternity - Pt 1
item.description: Several weeks have passed since Emmeline Kaley's harrowing encounter with the PRC, and SERENDIPITY is now facing a new, mysterious enemy--or are they?

item.title: Silent Universe - Episode 4 Preview!
item.description: Free preview of the high-def version of S/U

item.title: Silent Universe Companion - 001
item.description: Info on Episode 4, the Podcaster's Expo, Listener Feedback, Scott Sigler, J.C. Hutchins et al

item.title: Silent Universe 1x03 - Counterpoint
item.description: Time is running out for Emmeline Kaley and Ben Hernandez, trapped aboard a ship bound for the very heart of Red China. Determined to save them, SERENDIPITY mounts a rescue mission, but who are the true heroes and villains of this story? The answer may surprise you.

item.title: Silent Universe 1x02 - Chinese Chess
item.description: Our fast-paced sci-fi adventure picks up where the previous episode left off, letting us know the fate of Emmeline Kaley and her companion Ben Hernandez. Did they survive the accident? Will SERENDIPITY's risky nuclear plan be successful, or will the 300,000 citizens of Mars pay for their recklessness? Will Gill Frye ever get a clue? The answers to those questions and more all wait inside the latest installment.

item.title: Silent Universe 1x01 - Mission 256
item.description: Emmeline Kaley is a merc-for-hire looking for her next big gig, but it turns out her latest bounty is more than she ever expected.
